verses.roman:
ei-mata dui-jana nānā-kathā-raṅge
kṛṣṇa-kathā āsvādaya rahi' eka-saṅge

synonyms: ei-mata—in this way; dui-jana—two persons; nānā-kathā-raṅge—in the happiness of discussing various subject matters; kṛṣṇa-kathā—the subject matter of Kṛṣṇa; āsvādaya—they taste; rahi' eka-saṅge—keeping together.
translation: In this way the two of them passed their time discussing subjects concerning Kṛṣṇa. Thus they enjoyed life together.
